About the Company: HDFC Bank Ltd offers a wide range of commercial and transactional banking services and treasury products to wholesale and retail customers. The bank has three key business segments:Wholesale Banking Services - The Bank`s target market ranges from large, blue-chip manufacturing companies in the Indian corporate to small & mid-sized corporates and agri-based businesses. Retail Banking Services - The objective of the Retail Bank is to provide its target market customers a full range of financial products and banking services, giving the customer a one-stop window for all his/her banking requirements.Treasury - Within this business, the bank has three main product areas - Foreign Exchange and Derivatives, Local Currency Money Market & Debt Securities, and Equities. The Treasury business is responsible for managing the returns and market risk on this investment portfolio.The services offered by the bank include Personal Banking:Accounts & Deposits,Loans,Cards,Forex,Investments & Insurance.NRI Banking: Accounts & Deposits,Remittances & Investments & Insurance Loans Payment Services. Wholesale Banking: Corporate,Small & Medium Enterprises,Financial Institutions & Trusts & Government Sector.HDFC Bank was the first bank in India to launch an International Debit Card in association with VISA (VISA Electron) and issues the Mastercard Maestro debit card as well.
